page.title: 09SUPERNATURAL IN LUTTERWORTH
page.content: It has been reported that there are 5{Ghosts}around the town -{2 {poltergeists, 1 purposeful and {2 reoccuring ghosts.} Martins, the Pet Shop is said to have a poltergeist, which switches on the lights at night and unlocks doors. Items have been moved from one shelf to another and bags of dog biscuits have been split open. The Denbeigh Arms pub also has a poltergeist that throws objects around. The street{STONEY HOLLOW}is said to be haunted by the ghost(or ghosts) of those people hanged in earlier times at the local{gallows.} The Parish Church of St. Mary's is said to resound to the cries of a girl who threw herself off the church tower.
